name: 林懷恩
objective:
本課程主要分為三部分：
第一、	奈米科技介紹 (奈米材料之結構、形貌與機械性質，奈米材料之製造技術如氣相法、液相法與微影技術)；
第二、	奈米檢測 (顯微鏡、光譜分析)
第三、	奈米材料應用 (光觸媒、磁紀錄及燃料電池)
The course is divided into three parts:
Part 1: Introduction of nanotechnology (Microstructure and characteristics of nanomaterials, manufacturing process including vapor deposition, wet-chemical approach and lithography)
Part 2: Examination of nanomaterials (Microscopy, spectrographic analyses)
Part 3: Applications of nanomaterials in photocatalysts, magnetic recording and fuel cells.
